title: [Monastery, Library]
description: Warm sunlight filters through a highly detailed, large stained glass window set into the west wall, casting shadows about the room.  Highlighting the mars and scratches along the opposite wall, a soft glow showers some weathered bookcases built into the rough stone and a maple writing desk resting beside them.  A set of ascending steps rests in shadows to one side.

A set of ascending steps rests in shadows to one side.
